1.0.0.name: wordpress/bbpress-notifications
1.0.0.description:
bbPress Notifications allows you to automatically send email notifications to specific users when new topics or replies are posted. It integrates seamlessly into WP, by adding new section to bbPress settings page, where you can configure your notifications.

For more information, check out plugin page at dFactory or plugin support forum.

Features include:

  • Send notification when New Topic is published
  • Send notification when New Reply is published
  • Specify email addresses for notifications
  • Design email templates with a number of shortcodes
  • Available shortcodes: [blogname], [reply-title], [reply-content], [reply-excerpt], [reply-url], [reply-author], [topic-title], [topic-url], [topic-author]
  • .pot file for translations included
